__documentation__.viewer_lut_raw: set to `true` if you Input_process node on   viewer is used with baked screen space, so you have to look with RAW viewer lut. Else just keep it on `false`
__documentation__.enabled: keep in on `false` if you want Nuke baking colorspace workflow applied else FFmpeg will convert imgsequence with baked LUT

__documentation__.viewer_lut_raw: set to `true` if you Input_process node on   viewer is used with baked screen space, so you have to look with RAW viewer lut. Else just keep it on `false`
__documentation__.enabled: keep in on `true` if you want Nuke baking colorspace workflow applied

__documentation__.viewer_lut_raw: set to `true` if you Input_process node on   viewer is used with baked screen space, so you have to look with RAW viewer lut. Else just keep it on `false`
